sentences.sContent: a precocious child who walked and talked early
sentences.sCn: 走路和说话都早的早熟儿童

phrases.pCn: 性早熟；早熟青春期；性早熟症

remMethod.val: pre (预先) + coci (看作coct， 烹调) + ous (…的) → 预先烹调好的 → 早熟的

trans.tranOther: a precocious child shows intelligence or skill at a very young age, or behaves in an adult way – sometimes used to show disapproval in British English
